name: animated spoon
description: A moving spoon that doesn't try to bend itself.

name: animated butter knife
description: It's a butter knife that spreads the enemy's blood on the bread without permission.

name: animated fork
description: It's a moving fork that loves to poke out the eyes of its enemies.

name: animated spork
description: I'm a spork who learned to attack from a distance so that I don't have to share the role with a spoon and fork.

name: animated pizza cutter
description: The pizza cutter that stopped cutting pizza is on a journey to find a tougher opponent.

name: animated frying pan
description: An animated frying pan. It's floating in the air.If you get close enough, you can even float in the air for a little while.

name: Plant tentacle
description: Big plant tentacle that pulls nearby enemy and attack with its long body.

name: Sentry plant
description: sentry-plant that shoots seeds to nearest enemy.

name: Skeleton Grave
description: Summon 2 of lesser skeletons every 8 seconds.
A lesser skeleton, raised from grave.

petfood.pet: The %s happily wags its tail while you pat their head.

description: A mutant cockroach the size of a dog.
A brightly colored mutant centipede the size of a small dog, skittering quickly in the underbrush.  Probably won't think you're suitable prey, but beware its venom.

special_attacks.//: Bite does 6-10 dmg, armor penetration 5, 8 hits to max venom intensity

description: The predatory, aquatic larva of a dragonfly, normally barely a centimeter long and feeding on small fishes, grown to the size of a catfish.  Underneath its sharp mandibles you can see that its folded lower jaw changed into something resemblig a barbed spear.

A ferocious, bright green dragonfly, still lightning-fast despite growing to the size of a schoolchild.  Its head is little more than a basketball-sized pair of rainbow compound eyes, and its legs - already specialized for grasping prey - end in curved talons.
A tremendous housefly the size of a dog, predictably accompanied by a loud, incessant buzzing sound.
A giant mutant mosquito, fluttering erratically.  Its face is dominated by a long, spear-tipped proboscis.

name: Insect Summoner
description: summoner who excels in the art of summoning insects.

name: Flying mask
description: An animated mask, it seems to be staring at you the whole time.

name: Flying mask
description: An animated mask, it seems to be staring at you the whole time.

name: masked human
description: It is a human-like creature whose mind is controlled by a mask.
It is an electrified bird of chick. Would you like to touch it?

petfood.feed: The %s seems to like you!  It runs around your legs and seems friendly.

description: It is an electrified bird with large wings and two tails. Touching it is a good stimulus! Would you like to touch it?

petfood.feed: The %s seems to like you!  It runs around your legs and seems friendly.

description: It is an blaze bird of chick. It is releasing heat.

petfood.feed: The %s seems to like you!  It runs around your legs and seems friendly.

description: It is a blaze bird with large wings and two tails. It's so hot that you can sweat even from a distance.

petfood.feed: The %s seems to like you!  It runs around your legs and seems friendly.

name: Shaman
description: shaman who excels at summoning totems.

name: Slow Totem
description: slow nearby enemies.

name: Blind Totem
description: A totem that eliminates the vision of nearby enemies.

name: Tauntotem
description: Totems that taunt nearby enemies

name: Strengthening Totem
description: A totem that strengthening nearby friendly units.

name: Plague Rat Totem
description: A totem that Summons 1 of plague rats every 10 seconds.
The plague rat, an omnivorous rodent with sheer black fur and a long, rough tail.  Harbinger of pestilence, famine, and mange, it will sometimes swarm over the dead or dying.

name: Healing red Fairy
description: She is a fairy who will take a stand and heal your hp.

name: Healing blue Fairy
description: She is a fairy who will take a stand and heal your mp.

name: Dark Fairy
description: She is a fairy who will take a stand and heal your mp.

name: Enchanter
description: enchanter who excels in the art of enchanting and healing.

name: Frog Polymorpher
description: Polymorpher who excels in the art of Polymophing frogs.
A conspicuously average american bullfrog.  You better keep prince charming away from it.
A conspicuously average american bullfrog.  You better keep prince charming away from it.

name: lemure
description: A lemure resembles a molten mass of flesh with a vaguely humanoid head and torso.

name: Magical Botanist
description: botanist with access to nature-related magic.

name: wandering spirit
description: It is a wandering spirit. It doesn't seem dangerous, but it's very quick.

name: One-eyed bat
description: She is a fairy who will take a stand and heal your hp.

name: One-eyed turret
description: She is a fairy who will take a stand and heal your hp.

name: Golem turret
description: sentry-plant that shoots seeds to nearest enemy.

name: One-eyed Gate
description: sentry-plant that shoots seeds to nearest enemy.

name: low-ranking ninja
description: My ninjutsu skills are not yet up to par, but I am still a ninja!

name: low-ranking ninja
description: My ninjutsu skills are not yet up to par, but I am still a ninja!

name: low-ranking ninja
description: My ninjutsu skills are not yet up to par, but I am still a ninja!

name: middle-ranking ninja
description: He is a ninja who excels in ninjutsu. He will definitely make you confused!

name: middle-ranking ninja
description: He is a ninja who excels in ninjutsu. He will definitely make you confused!

name: middle-ranking ninja
description: He is a ninja who excels in ninjutsu. He will definitely make you confused!

name: animated pawn of chess
description: A moving pawn of chess that will come closer to you step by step.

name: animated rook of chess
description: A moving rook of chess that draws you in and delivers a powerful blow.

name: animated knight of chess
description: A moving chess knight that charges at you and deals damage.

name: animated bishop of chess
description: A moving bishop of chess that uses a variety of magic to provide support.

name: animated queen of chess
description: A moving queen of chess that can revive her fellow chess pieces.

name: animated king of chess
description: A moving king of chess that can summon his fellow chess pieces.
This poisonous mushroom is red and look delicious. Would you like to take a look at the poison?
It's a swarm of red mushrooms. It's got enough nutrients for a day.
It is a large mushroom, about the same size as a person. At first glance, it appears to be non-poisonous.
It is a large mushroom, about the same size as a person. its skin seems to be in bad shape.

name: Stump ghost
description: It's a ghost with a soul in a stump.He has a sturdy body, and even heavy objects seem to be smash away lightly!.

name: Red stump ghost
description:
It's a ghost with a lot of resentment and hatred in a stump.
He seems to be itching to push something away.
She is a charming little seed fairy. What will grow when you plant them?
It is a small seed fairy with a charming flower growing out of it. It smells a little sweet and nice.
It's a seed fairy with a poisonous needle. If you mess with it, you might regret it.
A worm with large ears. There's a lot of noise around here, and it doesn't look like it's working very well.
A red worm with large ears. There's a lot of noise around here, and it doesn't look like it's working very well.
A blue worm with large ears. There's a lot of noise around here, and it doesn't look like it's working very well.

name: Cactus
description: It is a cactus. It sends many thorns flying at once.

name: Old cactus
description: An old cactus. It sends many thorns flying at once.

name: Carnivorous plant
description:
It's a carnivorous plant that can even swallow people!
If you get too close to it, it looks very dangerous, so attack it from a distance or leave it alone!

special_attacks.description: The plant bites with its teeth.!

name: Aged carnivorous plant
description:
It's an carnivorous plant that has swallowed many people over the years!
Even if you're not near it, it will try to draw you in and swallow you up.

special_attacks.description: The plant bites with its teeth.!

description: It's a turnip floating in the air. He's doing his best to fly.
It's a turnip that can't fly anymore. He seems to have gained weight since he quit flying.
An insectivorous plant that has grown wings from eating too many insects.
An insectivorous plant that has turned red and grown wings from eating too many spicy insects!
It's just a snail. Except for the secretions.
It's just a snail. Except for the secretions.
It's just a snail. Except for the secretions.

name: Treasure Chest
description: A treasure chest that may contain treasure. Let's get closer and open it!

name: Mimic
description: It's a monster that turns into a treasure chest. It has a terrifying appearance.

name: Statue
description: Statue of the Queen of the Swamp. If you attack the statue, you will get a buff.

name: Statue
description: Statue of the Horned monster. If you attack the statue, you will get a buff.

name: Statue
description: Statue of cleric. If you attack the statue, you will get a buff.

name: Statue
description: Statue of the mysterious. If you attack the statue, you will get a buff.

name: Boss Statue
description: Statue of the boss. Approaching this stone statue summons the boss.

name: Evil stone statue
description: This stone statue has an evil atmosphere. It is better for your own safety not to destroy it.
With a stinger the size of a kitchen knife, this dog-sized insect's black and yellow markings warn you to leave it undisturbed.
//: 21 hits to max intensity, 25 hits to max duration

description: A bee whose body is about the same size as a child elephant. You shouldn't get too close.
A bee whose body is about the same size as a child elephant. They seem to be wary of us.
A bee whose body is as big as a child elephant. As you can see, they are hostile towards you.
A bee whose body is about the same size as a child elephant. You shouldn't get too close.
A bee whose body is about the same size as a child elephant. They seem to be wary of us.
A bee whose body is as big as a child elephant. As you can see, they are hostile towards you.
This short humanoid is covered in filth and shouts slurs at you as it brandishes a cudgel.
An ugly creature that slings rocks almost as well as it slings insults.

special_attacks.description: The goblin slings a rock at you!

description: An ugly creature that was promoted to chieftain because it figured out which end of the weapon is pointy.

Gnome warriors are a type of fairy with a small stature but tremendous strength and are found mainly underground and in mountainous regions. They are skilled warriors and are especially adept at close combat.

Treasure gazers are creatures with the ability to find treasure. They are able to hoard found treasures within their own bodies. They are often found living in caves and ruins.
When they die, they evolve the monsters around them.

Myconids are intelligent mushroom creatures that are peaceful and neutral beings, but can also be aggressive if provoked. They are typically found in underground caverns, and have the ability to communicate telepathically with each other and with other creatures.
These myconids are angered by the destruction of the mushrooms around them. They attack all surrounding monsters except their own kind at twice the normal speed.
unicorn has iridescent hair. Their iridescent hair is often long and flowing and radiant. Their bodies are also very graceful, usually with pure white fur and shining eyes.

petfood.feed: The %s seems to like you!  It lets you pat its head and seems friendly.

description: Small slime's bodies are soft and viscous and feel slippery to the touch. They can contract and stretch their bodies and can enter through narrow crevices and small holes. They also have the ability to self-regenerate and can gradually recover from damage sustained.
A black blob of viscous goo, oozing across the ground like a glob of living oil.

Big slime has a tougher body than other slimes and is covered with a very viscous body fluid. This mucus absorbs objects and attacks and has the property of restoring the slime's own strength. As a result, the big slime is very tough and durable and cannot be easily defeated by simple attacks.

Snail slime, like most slime, is covered with viscous body fluid, which contains a special component that promotes regeneration. This component allows the snail slime to quickly regenerate wounds and amputated areas, restoring them to their original state.

name: owlbear
description: The horrible owlbear is probably the result of genetic experimentation by some insane wizard.  These creatures inhabit the tangled forest regions of every temperate clime, as well as subterranean labyrinths.  They are ravenous eaters, aggressive hunters, and evil tempered at all times.  They attack prey on sight and will fight to the death.

name: Yule Cat
description: Magical beast from Icelandic folklore, known for their catlike appearance and their hobby of eating Workshop Elves.

name: black dragon wyrmling
description: This is a small black dragon, less than five years old.  Its scales are glossy, and its horns barely peek out of its head.  Even from one so young, you see the glint of sadism in its eyes.
Fish that have grown tremendously larger due to environmental changes.
gargoyle with a hard body made of stone and strong wings. It attacks mercilessly anything that approaches its treasure chest or treasury.
A ghost that floats around in the air. Basically, they are immune to all physical attacks, but since they are not particularly hostile, it is best to ignore them.

Fenristark is cunning and aggressive, swooping down from the air in pursuit of its prey and repelling it by stabbing it with its beak. The fenristark's feathers and beak can also be imbued with special magical powers, allowing it to create a gale from its feathers and blow poison from its beak.

As its name suggests, the Coral Hound is shaped like a dog on the outside, but its entire body is covered with coral-like scales. Their special scales can absorb nutrients from the seawater and strengthen their bodies. It also has sharp fangs and claws to confront its enemies, and may also manipulate special water magic.

petfood.feed: The %s seems to like you!  It lets you pat its head and seems friendly.
petfood.pet: The %s happily wags its tail while you pat their head.

description: As guardians of the forest, endelluus are charged with the mission of protecting the balance and harmony of the natural world. They are able to communicate with forest creatures and plants and use their magical powers to stimulate plant growth and restore the vitality of the forest. They also manipulate the forces of nature and fight to protect the environment.

name: dracolittle
description: They are only a few inches long and have small wings and tails, giving them a cute appearance. Generally, their scales are brightly colored, with shining red, green, and blue hues. Despite their small size, dracolitls are born with the ability to blow fluid.

Spinavine is a monster with spinach-like leaves. The leaves are deep green in color and are both tender and tough. Its stems and leaves have fibrous streaks, giving it both suppleness and brawn. Its characteristic fragrance also adds color to forests and gardens.

Floravians are birds with plant-like wings. Their bodies are entwined with delicate vines and tendrils, with flowers and leaves spreading gracefully. These monsters manipulate the forces of nature, using special pollen and magical flower energy to attack and heal.

The megawing is a huge winged bat, and its distinguishing feature is the size of its head. The head is very large compared to other bats, indicating intelligence and insight. They also have sharp eyes and are excellent at hunting and navigating in the dark.

The Cyclops Viper has a huge body with one large eye in the center of its head. Their eyes have a red, fiery glow and they look around with a piercing gaze. They have excellent eyesight and can spot enemies in the dark or at a distance.

The crystallostep has a head formed of transparent crystal, with an enigmatic glow and fantastic light inside. Its crystal head is extremely sturdy and serves not only to protect it from attacks, but also to store special energy.

At first glance, the touchrisk looks like an ordinary squirrel, but its left hand has been transformed into a giant tentacle. These tentacles are flexible and elastic and can be manipulated at will. The tentacles have fine senses and can grasp and touch objects.

Roselisks are medium-sized and have pink bodies covered with scales. They crawl on the ground with graceful movements, silently exploring their surroundings. Roselisks have a special ability: they spread petal-like scales from the tip of their tails, releasing a beautiful fragrance. This fragrance purifies the air around them and brings about a calm atmosphere. Their bodies also emit a faint healing energy that gives a pleasant sense of comfort to those nearby.

The Whisper Coffin is shaped like a large coffin, is pure white in appearance, and communicates with its surroundings by emitting a lonely whisper. When this monster is defeated, the monster sleeping inside wakes up.

death_function.message: The monster that had been sleeping in the coffin woke up!

description: Ruby dolls are small monsters whose heads are covered with red moss. Their eyes are bright red and shining, and their gaze is unusually sharp, shining like a jewel.

Frog bears are large monsters, with a torso and limbs shaped like a powerful bear. Their heads have the characteristics of frogs, with large round eyes, bulging cheeks, and long tongues. Their entire body is covered with green scales and they have the leaping power of a frog and the strong arms of a bear.

dolfaces have graceful dolphin heads, which are covered with smooth, blue skin. The head has large round eyes and a pointed beak-like object with a characteristic smiling expression.They are adapted to life underwater and have special sensory organs that sense the sound of waves and ocean tides. They perform sophisticated underwater maneuvers and can swim quickly.

name: leafwing totem
description: The leafwing Totem embodies the power and magic of nature. The entire totem is composed of a bunch of leaves and grass, symbolizing the balance and harmony of the natural world. These totems possess magical powers; they are able to gather the energy of nature and use that power to exercise healing and protective magic.

Bomb cats, as the name implies, are cat monsters that go on a suicide mission. When they find a target, they drop their own explosion-causing head and immediately flee. Apparently, the head will return to normal after a few days.

A bomb cat that has lost its head.
It won't do anything until the head regenerates, so it's safe!

Cactus mortars are rooted in the ground and attack from that position. Characteristically, it fires its attacks in a high arc, like a mortar. From the thick branches present at the top of the cactus, spheres and explosives filled with magical energy are launched. These attacks are highly destructive from a distance and can cause damage over a wide area.
The Green Forest is a bipedal monster whose body is composed of bushy leaves and flowers, and its appearance resembles a moving garden, attracting adventurers with its attractive appearance.

Gracefrost have thick blue furry bodies, sharp ice fangs, and icy claws. They have the ability to manipulate superior ice magic and lower the temperature of their surroundings. They also release shockwaves of cold air from their beautiful icy bodies to attack and freeze their enemies.

abyssal mouth do not have eyes, but instead have an excellent sense of smell and hearing. They can detect the presence of prey or enemies as they fly through the air. They are especially sensitive to fresh blood and magical energy, and when they smell these substances, they rapidly approach in their direction.

Lazy tails have all the characteristics of birds, but their distinguishing features are the size of their tails and their leisurely movements. Their tails are very long and they move while lying on the ground. They use their tail feathers to push the ground and move at a slow pace.

petfood.feed: The %s seems to like you!  It runs around your legs and seems friendly.

description: Mascara dolls are magical dolls with a figure that seems to combine beauty and strangeness. They have faces that mimic the appearance of human women, but their distinctive features are the size of their faces and their strange expressions. Their eyes are large and sharp, with a deep darkness in their pupils. Their faces are perfectly sculpted and radiate a quiet elegance, yet there is an eerie quality to their beauty.

name: serpentiface
description: serpentiface is a mask created by ancient magic and witchcraft, and its shape resembles a reptilian face. The masks are made of solid materials such as metal or stone, and their surfaces are decorated with intricate patterns and carvings. When reflecting light, the masks emit an eerie glow, evoking an ethereal life force.

Skyfins are monsters that has the body of a fish, but its bright scales ripple in the air and it is capable of flight. They are extremely agile and can soar freely through the air, pursuing their prey. Their distinctive mouths are large, with sharp teeth and powerful jaws that can chew up their prey in an instant. Their eyes are sharp and can spot prey in the dark.

Skylippers are terrifying looking monsters, much larger and more intimidating than humans in stature. Their distinctive part is their right hand, which is a huge scythe. The scythe is so sharp that it can cut through the air and mercilessly slice through its opponents. However, their armor is not very sturdy, and even a steak knife can hurt them.

The Amskylark is a bird monster with a graceful and beautiful appearance. Their distinctive appearance is a purple head and a body with bright blue feathers.They fly freely in the air, singing beautifully. Their calls echo beautifully and their tones enchant people.The singing voice of the amskylark has a variety of effects. Their songs can bring healing and comfort, as well as magical healing effects. Their songs also have the power to paralyze enemies, making them effective weapons in battle.

petfood.feed: The %s seems to like you!  It runs around your legs and seems friendly.

description: Tongue snatchers are moderate to large monsters whose distinctive appearance focuses on their large tongues. They have specialized tongues for capturing prey, and the length and flexibility of their tongues is remarkable. s tongues are used not only to catch prey quickly, but also to attract distant objects. Their tongues are sticky and can firmly capture prey and objects.

name: elephant head
description: Elephant heads, as their name implies, are monsters with only the head of an elephant. They possess wisdom and insight and can understand human speech. They occasionally communicate with adventurers and travelers, but their intentions and goals are puzzling and their relationships with humans are complex.

Tailgrappers are medium-sized monsters whose distinguishing ability is the use of their tails to grasp objects. They have a general beastly appearance, with sturdy limbs and sharp fangs. They are adept at manipulating their tails to not only capture prey or objects, but also to swing and throw them.

petfood.feed: The %s seems to like you!  It lets you pat its head and seems friendly.
petfood.pet: The %s happily wags its tail while you pat their head.

description: Grappleheads look like large birds and feature long necks and heads. Their heads are very long and have finger-shaped projections at the tip. These protrusions are articulated and can be flexibly bent to grasp objects.

petfood.feed: The %s seems to like you!  It runs around your legs and seems friendly.

name: sylphidragon
description: Sylphidragons are dragons with their graceful and mysterious presence. They have no limbs or wings, but can levitate their entire bodies at will. They manipulate their own ethereal magic and can control the flow of wind and chi at will. They may use their power to hunt or pursue knowledge and unlock the secrets of magic.
Mudro moles, as their name implies, are mole-shaped monsters with a muddy appearance. They prefer places where the soil is wet, such as underground or in wetlands, and live clad in mud and dirt.

Blaster Lizards are monsters that deliver powerful attacks from their distinctive left-handed cannons. They attack by approaching their enemies and accurately hitting them with their cannonballs. They also use their tough skin and quick body movements to evade enemy attacks.

Leafback rats have the appearance of a small mouse, but is characterized by the leaves that grow on its back. These leaves provide them with a variety of benefits. First, the leaves help them blend into nature and assimilate into the surrounding plants and environment. This allows them to protect themselves from enemies and predators. In addition, leaf rats can use the leaves on their backs to access food and water. They hide small berries, flowers, and insects among their leaves and ingest them when needed. They can also capture and stockpile rainwater in their leaves.

Emerald Sprouts are tiny fairies that live hidden in the grass. They have the fragile, slender appearance of a squirrel child and are only a few inches tall. Their bodies are made of transparent wings and delicate grass fibers, and their appearance is beautiful and graceful.

Ironavians are larger than the average sparrow, measuring about 150 centimeters in length. Their distinctive feature is their tough, hard skin. Their skin is as strong as steel and covers their bodies like armor. They have excellent flying skills and can fly freely in the air, holding their heavy exteriors by flapping their wings.

petfood.feed: The %s seems to like you!  It runs around your legs and seems friendly.

name: gale-force air slash
description: A magical wind created by gathering the energy of the surrounding wind and releasing it with the mana and power of a wizard, violently disrupting the surrounding air.
